Text: THANK YOU! I bought my Dreamcast simply so I could play this game. I love the Xbox version. I ordered a copy, but I can't wait for it to ship! Works great!
Also, your tip thought me how to burn Dreamcast discs, so thanks for that as well :)
You're welcome, man. I'm glad I helped you figure out how to burn Dreamcast games. Feel free to try out my other Dreamcast releases.
